highlights.text: Drink if you refuse a challenge

accordionItems.title: Instant App Access 📧
content: Access to the Deal You Dirty app with your Digital Decks is automatically delivered to your email.
Adding even more spicy challenges picked by the public, relationship therapist approved, to give you a night you'll never forget.

accordionItems.title: How To Play 🧑‍🤝‍🧑
content: With your partner, alternate drawing a card from the pack top side down.
If you draw a "...or drink" card, you must do what it says or drink.
If you draw a "drink if..." card, the card applies to both players. Whoever relates to it must drink.

accordionItems.title: What To Expect Playing 🤭
content: Expect lots of laughter, fun, and possibly ending up in the bedroom..
With 140 prompts designed for intimacy, love, & deepening connection.
& let the digital deck seal the deal. 🥳
